text: Brandon Cornell Jones (born October 6, 1982) is an American former professional football wide receiver. He played parts of 5 years in the National Football League (NFL). He played for the Tennessee Titans, San Francisco 49ers, and Seattle Seahawks. He was drafted out of the University of Oklahoma by the Tennessee Titans with the 96th pick in the third round of the 2005 NFL Draft. He also played for the Tennessee Titans from 2005 to 2008, San Francisco 49ers in 2009 and the Seattle Seahawks in 2010. He was also drafted by the New York Yankees of Major League Baseball but he didn't sign a contract with them. In 2011, the Baltimore Ravens signed Jones. Jones caught the game- winning touchdown from Tyrod Taylor in a preseason game against the Washington Redskins, but was released by the Ravens. ==References== ==Other websites== *Brendon Jones' NFL player profile Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:Seattle Seahawks players Category:Tennessee Titans players Category:American football wide receivers Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Brandon Jones (wide receiver)
